game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an adventure to discover the long-lost treasure hidden deep within the mysterious island.

task.description: Search for clues and complete challenges to acquire a legendary treasure map.
Overcome dangerous obstacles and solve riddles to find the entrance to the hidden cave in the dense jungle.
Unravel the ancient puzzle and unlock the secret door guarding the treasure chamber.
Battle against a fearsome guardian monster to claim the lost treasure as your own.
